quote: “Only a life lived for others is a life lived worthwhile.
author: Romark Cacho

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Romark Cacho

quote: “Pick up the battle and make it a better world. Just where you are.
author: Romark Cacho

quote: “You must take action. You must do the impossible. Because giving up is never an option.
author: Romark Cacho
